page.title: 13Games children play.
page.content: We then thought about some of the games people play.Here we have written about some of the games children play. 1.Sticky Glue. You first of all have to choose someone to be 'It',that person spreads out their fingers and everyon else in the game holds one of the fingers.'It' then shouts Sticky Glue and everyone has to run off and'It' chases after them.If we are caught we have to stand still with our arms out until someone runs under them to set us free.Some people also call this game Stuck in the Mud. We also enjoy playing Bulldog where two people have to try and stop people running from one line to another,the first two people caught are then it.
